description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Be the best racer in the Viking Edition of Antigrav Racing Championship.  Choose any of the 8 high speed hovercrafts and rule on the 5 Viking race tracks. ARC Viking Edition features a top 50 online scoreboard for each track.  Can you make it to the top ??!!
